1461742407729307648.text: @smoyac @OpenApiSpec @AsyncAPISpec @jsonschema So much truth! I love watching everyone do the meaningful work behind these specs.

1461728556996706310.text:
Me....

7:00 AM: APIs are dumb.

12:00 PM: These are really interesting APIs.

6:00 PM: If done well, these APIs will save the world.

9:00 PM: APIs are dumb.

1459197241319510021.text: @gertjanwilde @nickleplated @getpostman The team dove in. No elevated 504s recently. Depends on how you are using and which APIs there could be other external or internal issues. More details would help identify isolate to the application or API.

1458597644335411205.text: @PetuniaGray Some people are puzzle makers and some people are puzzle players. I think you have a bright future as puzzle maker, but also storyteller. Fruitful combo!!

1458458896482275328.text: @NickSinai @mattwensing Sadly no. I've heard of a few folks suggest building, but haven't seen a solution emerge to date. As the number of APIs in our toolbox grows, this is only going to become more of a problem. I would love to see it get built.

1458161560862420994.text: Doing Breaking Changes has pushed me over the line with watching my own videos. I used to hate watching, then I just cringe watched, then I was bored & now I am picking it apart and actually trying to change my behavior. Kept notes of my QCon talk just now on where I can improve.

1455306386326179842.text: I invented a new word today -- untigration. You know like API untigration, the act of removing the integrations that exist between our systems.
